item.title: Sam Smith - Too Good At Goodbyes - Key of Dm - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Too Good At Goodbyes by Sam Smith from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, Dm, F, Gm.

item.title: Sam Smith - Stay With Me - Key of Am - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Stay With Me by Sam Smith from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: Am, C, F.

item.title: Sam Smith & Normani - Dancing With a Stranger - Key of G - Playtheukewithme
item.description: Play along video for the song Dancing With a Stranger by Sam Smith & Normani from the channel Playtheukewithme. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.
